member.name: ICategoryProvider.CanCategorizeOnSCID
member.summary: Determines whether a column can be used as a category.
member.param: A pointer to a SHCOLUMNID structure that identifies the column. Valid only when S_OK is returned. The GUID contained in this structure is then passed to .
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the column can be used as a category or S_FALSE if not.

member.name: ICategoryProvider.CreateCategory
member.param: A pointer to the GUID for the category object.
The identifier of the object to return. Currently, the only value supported by the system folder view object is IID_ICategorizer.
When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the category object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICategoryProvider.EnumCategories
member.summary: Gets the enumerator for the list of GUIDs that represent categories.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to an IEnumGUID interface that specifies a list of GUIDs that represent categories.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICategoryProvider.GetCategoryForSCID
member.summary: Gets a GUID that represents the categorizer to use for the specified Shell column.
member.param: A pointer to a SHCOLUMNID structure.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to a GUID that represents the categorizer to use for the SHCOLUMNID pointed to by pscid.
member.returns: Returns either S_OK on success or S_FALSE on failure.

member.name: ICategoryProvider.GetCategoryName
member.summary: Gets the name of the specified category.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a string that receives the name of the category.
An integer that receives the number of characters in the string.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
